methods.name: GetItemChecked
methods.description: Gets the checked state of the SideBar. Counting starts with 1.

methods.name: HasItemCheckBox
methods.description: true, if item has a CheckBox. Counting starts with 1.

methods.name: LoadItemsFromFile
methods.description: Loads the menu items from a file.

methods.name: SetItemChecked
methods.description: Sets the checked state of the SideBar item. Counting starts with 1.

methods.name: SetItemEnabled
methods.description: Sets enabled state of SideBar item. Counting starts with 1.

methods.name: SetItemIconColor
methods.description: Sets the icon color of the SideBar item. Counting starts with 1.

methods.name: SetItemIconName
methods.description: Sets the icon name of the SideBar item. Counting starts with 1.

methods.name: SetItemText
methods.description: Sets the text of the SideBar item. Counting starts with 1.

blockProperties.name: BackgroundColor
blockProperties.description: Specifies the SideBars's background color as an alpha-red-green-blue integer.

blockProperties.name: Enabled
blockProperties.description: Specifies whether the SideBar should be active and clickable.

blockProperties.name: FitImageSize
blockProperties.description: Specifies wether the top image is scaled to the SideBar's width.

blockProperties.name: FontSize
blockProperties.description: Specifies the font size, measured in sp(scale-independent pixels).

blockProperties.name: IconColor
blockProperties.description: Specifies the SideBars's icon color as an alpha-red-green-blue integer.

blockProperties.name: Image
blockProperties.description: Sets the top image asset file name.

blockProperties.name: ImageAlignment
blockProperties.description: Specifies the alignment of the title image: left, center, right).

blockProperties.name: IsOpened
blockProperties.description: Gets wether the SideBar is opened.

blockProperties.name: ItemsFromFile
blockProperties.description: Loads the items from a file.

blockProperties.name: ItemsFromString
blockProperties.description: Set the list from a string of comma-separated values.

blockProperties.name: PaddingIcon
blockProperties.description: Specifies the padding of the icon to the left border.

blockProperties.name: PaddingText
blockProperties.description: Specifies the distance between the icon and the text.

blockProperties.name: SidebarWidthPercentage
blockProperties.description: Specifies the width of the sidebar as a percentage of the display width [30..90].

blockProperties.name: SwipeDetectorWidth
blockProperties.description: Sets the size of the siwpe detector field.

blockProperties.name: SwitchThumbColorActive
blockProperties.description: Specifies the Switch's thumb color when switch is in the On state.

blockProperties.name: SwitchThumbColorInactive
blockProperties.description: Specifies the Switch's thumb color when switch is in the Off state.

blockProperties.name: SwitchTrackColorActive
blockProperties.description: Color of the toggle track when switched on.

blockProperties.name: SwitchTrackColorInactive
blockProperties.description: Color of the toggle track when switched off.

blockProperties.name: TextColor
blockProperties.description: Specifies the SideBars's text color as an alpha-red-green-blue integer.

blockProperties.name: TextColorInactive
blockProperties.description: Specifies the SideBars's text color as an alpha-red-green-blue integer.

blockProperties.name: UseSwitches
blockProperties.description: Specifies wether the SideBar displays Switches instead of CheckBoxes.

blockProperties.name: Version
blockProperties.description: Returns the component's version name.

events.name: AfterSelecting
events.description: Event for after item selection from the SideBar

events.name: ItemCheckedChanged
events.description: Chacked state of a SideBar item has changed.
